t: Gaea's Blessing | Home
s: We offer non-GMO varieties, with certified organic varieties available. We focus on biodiversity, environmental stability, and responsible growing. Our seeds are high yield and hardy, and will grow well in most climates. Our seeds are selected based on research, cultural, and environmental cues.
